pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multiplicative Mixed Models using Template Model Builder // Fit multiplicative mixed models using maximum likelihood estimation via the Template Model Builder (TMB), Kristensen K, Nielsen A, Berg CW, Skaug H, Bell BM (2016) doi:10.18637/jss.v070.i05. One version of the multiplicative mixed model is applied in Piepho (1999) doi:10.1111/j.0006-341X.1999.01120.x. The package provides functions for calculating confidence intervals for the model parameters and for performing likelihood ratio tests.
